name: Bossfight Hero
description:
Bossfight Hero is the game for people who enjoy the thrilling action and challenge of a good bossfight, without the forced need of a grind (like in many MMOs), and without needing to solve easy challenges.

The game is a 2D platformer, with bosses which are unlocked on a linear way, with much replayability to be added later. 

Important stuff:

  • You move our hero with keys A (left)  and D (right)
  • You can jump (and double jump) with W
  • The hero owns two trusty tools for defeating your enemies, a sword, and a bow & arrow. You can switch between equipped weapons with the key Q.
  • Finally, when you are determined to deal some serious damage to your opponent (or opponents?), press the letter J to attack with your equipped weapon.
